name: ConditionsAssociatedWithChronicPain
title: Conditions associated with chronic pain
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Conditions that indicate chronic pain or are likely to cause chronic pain.),(Data Element Scope: Diagnosis, findings, encounter diagnosis, problem list),(Inclusion Criteria: Conditions that indicate chronic pain or are likely to cause chronic pain as documented in the article by Tian, Zlateva & Anderson (2013). Pain-associated codes in this ICD10 value set map to ICD9 codes from the research study. Retrieved from https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3861913/. Additional concepts added based on SME input.),(Exclusion Criteria: Conditions representing cancer-associated pain and those not contained the article by Tian, Zlateva & Anderson (2013). Inactive codes.)
